rules_text:
Create a token that's a copy of target creature you control.
Fabled {5}{U}{U} [i](Then if you cast this for its fabled cost, put it onto the battlefield transformed attached to that creature.)[/i]
rules_text2:
Enchant creature you control
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a token that's a copy of enchanted creature.
flavor_text2:
[i]“They flocked to him, gazes dull, begging to become him and escape their pain.”
—Hemley Eggfeather[/i]
